definition[0]: used to say ‘sorry’ politely when you have accidentally pushed someone or interrupted them
example[0]: Oh, pardon me, I didn’t mean to disturb you.
definition[1]: used to say ‘sorry’ politely after you have made an impolite sound such as a burp
definition[2]: used before you politely correct someone or disagree with them
example[1]: James, if you’ll pardon me, you’ve got it all wrong.
definition[3]: used to politely get someone’s attention in order to ask them a question
example[2]: Pardon me, can you direct me to City Hall?
